participants: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire

messages.message: hey Georgia! Sorry, just seeing this - do you still need an answer here?

IBML is a data format that only redactor and visual refiner uses, but the new IBDOC format is pretty similar in concept. We are planning to deprecate IBMLs as we move visual refiner / redactor functionality into refiner 5

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: I sent a follow up question for it to gain clarity on what they were asking but this is helpful! Thank you!
